'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

== Background==
This is the workshop of [[Iolfr]], the local tailor.

==Points of interest==
* There's three rooms, plenty of tailoring stuff, and a chest that can be pilfered with [[Mechanics]] 12.

==Characters==
* [[Iolfr]], the proprietor.

==Loot==
* [[Mantle of the Seven Bolts]], [[Burglar's Gloves]], [[Ngati's Girdle]], and [[Three Trolls Stitched]]: On sale.
* [[Ngati's Girdle]]: Can be stolen from the locked chest.
